EmailTemplate.name: GoDirect Web Portal Request Denied
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} Denied {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, Thank you for requesting access to the Aerospace web portal.
We are unable to provide you with access for the following reason: XXXXXXX.
If you have any questions or need further assistance, please reply to to this email and include your {!Case.CaseNumber} when sending your reply.
Thank you and Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
Honeywell | Aerospace
Email: fssaccounts@honeywell.com
